thread.section_title: Hotel Brighton - Esprit de France - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Value for Money in a nice neighbourhood
thread.title_full: Value for Money in a nice neighbourhood - Review of Hotel Brighton - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Joku_en_route
title: Value for Money in a nice neighbourhood
text:
Hotel Brighton is a great place to stay when in Paris. It's in Zone One right opposite to the Jadin de Tuileries and 5 mins walk to Louvre.
The reception is really nicely fitted out and the staff are warm and friendly. Our flight arrived in the early morning and they help us to provide an early check in which allowed us to freshen up and start our travel for the day.
